qas.question: How long it will take for express laundry?
Is there any additional charges for express laundry?
Does the additional charges for all items?

paragraphs.context: Our Express laundry service will return your items within 5 hours. Each item is subject to 50% additional charge.

qas.question: What time items will be collected for regular laundry service?
What will be the delivery time for regular laundry service?
What time it will be delivered if items collected after 10 am?

paragraphs.context: Our Regular Laundry Service: Items collected before 10am will be delivered between 6-8pm same day. Items collected after 10am will be delivered 10am-12pm on the following day.

qas.question: How long it will take for regular pressing?

paragraphs.context: Our regular pressing service will return your collected items within 4 hours.

qas.question: Is there any additional charges applicable?
How long it will take for express pressing?

paragraphs.context: Our express pressing service will deliver the collected items within an hour, Subject to a 50% additional charge.

qas.question: What is the contact number to reach the reservations team for room booking?
What is the email to reach the Reservations Team for room booking?
What information you need for call back?

answers.text: contact details including your e-mail address

paragraphs.context: Kindly provide us your contact details including your e-mail address and our Reservations Team shall get back to you.Alternatively, you may also reach them at +971 4 364 7555 or you may send an e-mail to reservations@abc.com.

qas.question: Which wifi network can be used?

answers.text: open a web browser and click on the CONNECT button

paragraphs.context: To set up the Wi-Fi please select the network 'iJumeirah'.This will present a welcome to Jumeirah page - Please click the CONNECT button and you shall be connected. Or otherwise, open a web browser and click on the CONNECT button.

qas.question: What is the breakfast serving period in Mundo during weekdays?
What is the breakfast serving period in Mundo during weekends?
Where is the Mundo restaurant located?

paragraphs.context: Buffet breakfast is served in Mundo located in the lobby level (UL) daily from 6am till 11am during weekdays and from 6am till 11:30am on Fridays and Saturdays.
